Momofuku Octo Vinaigrette
2 tbsp garlic
2 tbsp ginger
1 chilli
60ml rice wine vinegar
60ml light soy sauce
2 tbsp neutral oil (sunflower/rapeseed etc)
1/4 tsp sesame oil
1 tbsp sugar
black pepper
  1. Chop the garlic, ginger and chilli into ~2mm cubes
  2. Mix everything together. Taste and add a bit more sugar if it needs it
  3. Best used fresh, but itâ€™ll keep for a few days in the fridge
